|vo_09_03_rm         = 
|vo_09_03_tl         = A long time ago I tried to find my biological mother for a long time, but I eventually couldn't. Instead, I found a very old message. It was… left by my「Clone Mother」. As I listened to the message, it seemed like she knew me well. It also felt like the message was encouraging me
